title: Virtual Wall® Mode for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video on using the Virtual Wall® Mode for your iRobot® Braava jet Mopping Robot. To prevent Braava jet™ from going into other rooms, an invisible barrier can be created with Virtual Wall® Mode so that the robot will avoid cleaning part of a room or a different floor type. You can also use Virtual Wall Mode to divide a larger room into smaller areas to help Braava jet clean more efficiently.

asset.title: Virtual Wall® Mode for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video on using the Virtual Wall® Mode for your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. To prevent Braava jet™ from going into other rooms, an invisible barrier can be created with Virtual Wall® Mode so that the robot will avoid cleaning part of a room or a different floor type. You can also use Virtual Wall Mode to divide a larger room into smaller areas to help Braava jet clean more efficiently.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot
